author: eRiC
description:
Typing triggered actions! Mostly to correct typing or to insert longer texts by writing shortcuts. But this can also trigger any Autohotkey action.
WIP! Currently only the "Case" option and the "Trigger Immediately" checkbox work.

code:
print('Import Hotstrings ...')
file_path, _ = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getOpenFileName(
    None, 'Import Hotstrings Data', module.path, '(*.ahk *.json)')

if file_path:
    import a2util
    import os
    cwd = os.getcwd()
    print(cwd)
label: Import Hotstrings
